nodes.text: Umbriss's estate was an estate the Sith Lord Umbriss of the reconstituted Sith Empire owned around the time of the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. However, the estate was taken by one of his superiors, a Sith by the name of Darth Angral, when Umbriss incurred Angral's wrath and was killed. Angral claimed his opponent's wealth and possessions as his own, including Umbriss's estate and apprentice Sadic.

Umbriss's estate has its first and only mention alongside its owner in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, which features an in-game Codex. The entry for Umbriss's apprentice, Lord Sadic, detailed his demise and how Darth Angral acquired Sadic as an apprentice. Jedi Knight players receive this entry after defeating Sadic in the class mission "Showdown with Lord Sadic" on the planet Nar Shaddaa.
